name: Raging Redcap

specials.name: Blood Soak
specials.description: The redcap dips its cap in the blood of a slain foe. The foe must have died in the last minute, and the redcap must have helped kill it. The redcap gains a +4 status bonus to damage rolls for 1 minute.

specials.name: Stomp
specials.description: The redcap Strides up to half its Speed and makes a boot Strike at any point during that movement. If the boot Strike hits a prone creature, it deals an extra 2d6 persistent bleed damage.

specials.name: Rage
specials.description: As the barbarian class ability; +11 HP, +6 melee damage, +10 movement speed, darkvision, -1 AC.

specials.name: Furious Bully
specials.description: While raging, +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks for attack actions.

specials.name: Deadly Cleave
specials.description: The Redcap reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a scythe strike; The redcap makes another scythe strike against a different creature, using the same multiple attack penalty as the scythe strike that trigged the reaction. This counts towards its multiple attack penalty.

specials.name: Divine Revulsion
specials.description: If a redcap sees a creature brandish a religious symbol of a good deity (which requires an interact action by that creature) or uses one to cast a divine spell, the redcap must attempt a DC 23 Will Save. It then becomes temporarily immune to all brandished religious symbols for 10 minutes. Critical success, the Redcap is unaffected; success, the Redcap is frightened 2; failure, the Redcap gains the fleeing condition for 1 round and becomes frightened 4.

items: Iron Boots, Red Cap (if a Red Cap loses it's cap, it no longer benefits from fast healing and takes a -4 status penalty to its damage rolls. It can create a new cap in 10 minutes but that cap doesn't grant its powers until it has been turned red with Blood Soak. A cap has no benefit for creatures other than the red cap who made it), +1 Striking Scythe
